item.title: nmap - scan an ip range for a single open port
item.description: nmap -p80 192.168.0.0/24 -oG - | grep 80/open Example [modinfo@arch-pc ~]$ nmap -p80 192.168.0.0/24 -oG - | grep 80/open Host: 192.168.0.1 (router) Ports: 80/open/tcp//http/// Host: 192.168.0.100 (aaa) Ports: 80/open/tcp//http/// Host: 192.168.0.126 (nsa310) Ports: 80/open/tcp//http/// Host: 192.168.0.133 (arch-pc) Ports: 80/open/tcp//http///
